<h5>Business Analysis & Strategy</h5>

<h5>Macro Analysis & Research</h5>

<p>We specialize in Socio-Economic Development, Public Health and Macro Economic analysis. Our unique statistical insights and trends provide a detailed picture of how these changes impact countries, consumers and business environment.</p>
:::

<h5>Market Research</h5>

<p>We provide deep sector-specific intelligence for businesses and consultants to help clients leverage emerging business opportunities, explore new markets and analyze competitor landscape by crucial consumer goods and service industry insights.</p>
:::

::: {.consulting .g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .g-col-lg-4}

<h5>Predictive Analytics</h5>

<p>Our data science team applies state-of-the-art methodologies in Machine Learning and Statistics to help you create demand forecasts of your products, recommendation systems to cross-sell products, gain insights into consumer behavior across different customer demographics and segments, and much more.</p>
:::

::: {.consulting .g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .g-col-lg-4}
<img src="images/services/visualization&amp;shiny.png"/>

<h5>Visual Dashboards & Applications</h5>

<p>We create visually interactive dashboards and data applications to help you explore your business data and highlight new insights across your business processes at management levels using analytics and web maps. We ensure that the applications are scaleable and run smoothly irrespective of the data size and users.</p>
:::

::: {.consulting .g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .g-col-lg-4}

<h5>Spatial Analytics</h5>

<p>There is a geographic dimension for all business and marketing activities. We help you find when and where your business generates more revenue geographically. By creating high quality maps, We provide consultancy in spatial data analysis, spatial modeling, and spatial data visualization.</p>
